bool Mesquite::TMetric::evaluate_with_hess ( const MsqMatrix< 2, 2 > &  T,
double &  result,
MsqMatrix< 2, 2 > &  deriv_wrt_T,
MsqMatrix< 2, 2 >  second_wrt_T[3],
MsqError &  err 
) [virtual]

Hessian of with respect to components of T.

Parameters:
T 3x3 relative measure matrix (typically A W^-1)
result Output: value of function
deriv_wrt_T Output: partial deriviatve of wrt each term of T, evaluated at passed T.
second_wrt_T Output: 9x9 matrix of second partial deriviatve of wrt each term of T, in row-major order. The symmetric matrix is decomposed into 3x3 blocks and only the upper diagonal blocks, in row-major order, are returned.

Returns:
false if function cannot be evaluated for given T (e.g. division by zero, etc.), true otherwise.

Reimplemented in Mesquite::TMixed, Mesquite::TOffset, Mesquite::TPower2, Mesquite::TScale, Mesquite::TSquared, Mesquite::TSum, Mesquite::TInverseMeanRatio, Mesquite::TShape2DNB2, Mesquite::TShapeB1, Mesquite::TShapeNB1, Mesquite::TShapeOrientB1, Mesquite::TShapeOrientB2, Mesquite::TShapeOrientNB1, Mesquite::TShapeOrientNB2, Mesquite::TShapeSize2DB2, Mesquite::TShapeSize2DNB1, Mesquite::TShapeSize2DNB2, Mesquite::TShapeSizeB1, Mesquite::TShapeSizeB3, Mesquite::TShapeSizeNB3, Mesquite::TShapeSizeOrientB1, Mesquite::TShapeSizeOrientB2, Mesquite::TShapeSizeOrientNB1, Mesquite::TSizeB1, Mesquite::TSizeNB1, Mesquite::TUntangle1, Mesquite::TUntangleBeta, and Mesquite::TUntangleMu.

bool Mesquite::TMetric::evaluate_with_hess ( const MsqMatrix< 3, 3 > &  T,
double &  result,
MsqMatrix< 3, 3 > &  deriv_wrt_T,
MsqMatrix< 3, 3 >  second_wrt_T[6],
MsqError &  err 
) [virtual]

Hessian of with respect to components of T.

Parameters:
T 3x3 relative measure matrix (typically A W^-1)
result Output: value of function
deriv_wrt_T Output: partial deriviatve of wrt each term of T, evaluated at passed T.
second_wrt_T Output: 9x9 matrix of second partial deriviatve of wrt each term of T, in row-major order. The symmetric matrix is decomposed into 3x3 blocks and only the upper diagonal blocks, in row-major order, are returned.

Returns:
false if function cannot be evaluated for given T (e.g. division by zero, etc.), true otherwise.
